'''Fullmoon Egg''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Fullmoon Egg is obtainable from [[Yueshu]] at [[Xinyue Kiosk]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Fullmoon Egg revives and restores '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this can not target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* This dish bears a striking resemblance to the Chinese {{w|shumai}} (Chinese: 烧卖 ''shāomài)'', specifically the Cantonese-style shumai.
** The Indonesian version of real-life shumai is made with shrimp and fish, but the Chinese version has shrimp, pork, and mushrooms.
